```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## R Markdown


```{r}
tmp <- data.table::fread("~/Downloads/StatementCsv (1).csv")
```

```{r}
tmp2 <- tmp %>%
  arrange(desc(Amount))
  
```


```{r}
tmp %>% filter(Amount > -50 ,Amount< 0) %>%
  ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x=Amount)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
tmp %>% filter(Amount > 0 ) %>%
  pull(Amount) %>%
  sum()
```


```{r}
tmp %>% filter(grepl("WOOLW|COLES",`Transaction Description`)) %>%
  pull(Amount) %>%
  sum()
```
